meanings.definition: Transforming something into gold through a magical process.
meanings.sent1: The alchemising of the old ring turned it into a shiny gold band.
meanings.sent2: The alchemising of the potion changed it into a valuable elixir.
meanings.sent3: The alchemising of the broken toy car made it a golden treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her alchemising of words turned them into poetic gold.
meanings.sent5: The alchemising of the dull rock created a gleaming golden nugget.

meanings.definition: Changing or transforming something in a mysterious or magical way.
meanings.sent1: The alchemising potion had a mysterious effect on the plants.
meanings.sent2: The alchemising process transformed the ordinary book into a magical tale.
meanings.sent3: The alchemising cat seemed to make objects disappear and reappear.
meanings.sent4: Her alchemising touch turned the plain dress into a shimmering gown.
meanings.sent5: The alchemising forest was filled with enchanted creatures and plants.
